com.dploeger.sqltools
Class SQLBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.dploeger.sqltools.SQLBuilder

public class SQLBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

The SQLBuilder is a tool based on a set of classes to easily build SQL-statements You only have to build some table, select or where-clause-objects and add them together the way you want and push them all into the SQLBuilder-object and run build() to get the SQL-statement. SQLBuilder

                  java.util.ArrayList sqlTables,

Constructor for the class. (with Wheres)

Parameters:
sqlSelects - The SQLSelect-objects to describe the select-clause
sqlTables - The SQLTable-objects to describe the from-clause
sqlWheres - The SQLWhere-objects to describe the where clause

Method Detail

build

public java.lang.String build()
Builds the SQL statement based on the SQLSelect, SQLTable and (optionally) SQLWhere-Objects provided in the constructor

Returns:
the SQL-Statement as a String
